ygData.subject: Re: Only 1 error left in building Heritrix
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks a million for the response.  I grabbed the svn/trunk and that built perfectly with Maven.  Looks like I m now good to go. I plan on writing a writer

Thanks a million for the response.  I grabbed the svn/trunk and that
built =
perfectly with Maven.  Looks like I'm now good to go.

I plan on writing a =
"writer" module that simply sends the html to an
RPC.  The RPC app will fig=
ure out what to do with the downloaded html.

And I also plan on writing a =
DecidingScope SubModule that sends the
html to an RPC call and receives an =
ACCEPT/REJECT back from it.

I'm doing this becaues I have some extremely c=
omplex text processing I
do in Perl to process the text and also to decide =
if the crawling
should continue along the current scope.

Would it be prude=
nt to write these with the intention of submitting
them to the main develop=
ment branch, or just hack them out for my own use?
